> [kaar4bears](#comment_32_1MGP7Q7y11YBjwi2dUkB2Q93KusgxDCqsr): And the world is just not worth living, with its unequality, climate apocalypse, shit jobs, and much more suffering than pleasures.

To OP: 
This is so bullshit reasons I'm starting to think you are trolling. 
If you are not kidding, try to avoid reading social networks and news sites for at least two weeks, and you are OK. 
If depression is really deep, ask your doctor for Prozac (but don't say about suicidal intentions). 

To others: remember in some countries posting about suicide methods is illegal, and some government-related persons could start such threads to "expose" ZeroNet as a place for illegal activities.
